rules.description: Colemak Mod-DH-Mod-DM ANSI Curl, Angle & Wide Mod

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'set volume output volume (output volume of (get volume settings) + 5) --100%'
osascript -e 'set volume output volume (output volume of (get volume settings) - 5) --100%'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to log out'
